languages.text: "Странно, ничего я такого не вижу и не слышу с той стороны... Но скажу вслух, раз все стесняются — не нравится мне все это. Если тьма покинет лес, случится что-то плохое? Обычно все как-то наоборот работает".

traits.locale_text: "Странно, ничего я такого не вижу и не слышу с той стороны... Но скажу вслух, раз все стесняются — не нравится мне все это. Если тьма покинет лес, случится что-то плохое? Обычно все как-то наоборот работает".

languages.text: "That's strange. I can't see or hear anything from the other side... But I'll go ahead and say it since nobody else wants to — I don't like this one bit. So if the darkness leaves the forest, something bad will happen? I thought it was usually the other way around."
languages.original_text: "Странно, ничего я такого не вижу и не слышу с той стороны... Но скажу вслух, раз все стесняются — не нравится мне все это. Если тьма покинет лес, случится что-то плохое? Обычно все как-то наоборот работает".

traits.locale_text: "That's strange. I can't see nor hear anything coming from that site... But I'll speak up on everyone's behalf, since nobody is willing to say it — I don't like it one bit. If the darkness leaves the forest, will something bad happen then? Things often tend to work backwards somehow."

"That's strange. I can't see nor hear anything coming from that site... But I'll speak up on everyone's behalf, since nobody is willing to say it — I don't like it one bit. If the darkness leaves the forest, will something bad happen then? Things often tend to work backwards somehow."

"That's strange. I can't see or hear anything coming from that site... But I'll speak up on everyone's behalf since nobody is willing to say it — I don't like it one bit. If the darkness leaves the forest, will something bad happen then? Things often tend to work backward somehow."

"That's strange. I can't see or hear anything coming from that site... But I'll speak up on everyone's behalf since nobody is willing to say it — I don't like it one bit. If the darkness leaves the forest, will something bad happen then? Things often tend to work backward somehow."

"That's strange. I can't see or hear anything from the other side... But I'll go ahead and say it since nobody else wants to — I don't like this one bit. So if the darkness leaves the forest, something bad will happen? I thought it was usually the other way around."

"That's strange. I can't see or hear anything from the other side... But I'll go ahead and say it since nobody else wants to — I don't like this one bit. So if the darkness leaves the forest, something bad will happen? I thought it was usually the other way around."

languages.text: «Qué raro. No veo ni oigo nada proveniente del otro lado... pero hablaré en nombre de todos, ya que nadie parece dispuesto a decirlo: esto me da muy mala espina. Así que si la oscuridad abandona el bosque, ¿sucederá algo malo? Pensaba que normalmente era al revés».
languages.original_text: "That's strange. I can't see or hear anything from the other side... But I'll go ahead and say it since nobody else wants to — I don't like this one bit. So if the darkness leaves the forest, something bad will happen? I thought it was usually the other way around."

traits.locale_text: «Qué raro. No veo ni oigo nada proveniente de ese lugar... pero hablaré en nombre de todos, ya que nadie parece dispuesto a decirlo: esto me da muy mala espina. Si la oscuridad abandona el bosque, ¿no ocurrirá nada malo después? De algún modo, las cosas suelen acabar saliendo del revés».

languages.text: “这很古怪。那边的一切我既看不到，也听不到……既然没人打算开口，那我就替大家把憋着的话都说出来吧——我一点也不喜欢这种感觉。也就是说，一旦黑暗离开森林，就会发生什么坏事，是吧？越是怕坏事，坏事就越是会来。”
languages.original_text: "That's strange. I can't see or hear anything from the other side... But I'll go ahead and say it since nobody else wants to — I don't like this one bit. So if the darkness leaves the forest, something bad will happen? I thought it was usually the other way around."

traits.locale_text: “这是古怪。那边的一切我既看不到，也听不到……虽然我不喜欢这样，但既然没人打算开口，那我就替大家把憋着的话都说出来吧。如果黑暗离开森林，真的会发生什么坏事吗？事情往往会朝意想不到的方向发展。”

languages.text: « C'est bizarre. Tout est calme de l'autre côté de la porte... mais j'ai un mauvais pressentiment, et je pense que j'exprime l'avis général en disant ça. Il se passera quelque chose de terrible si les ténèbres quittent la forêt ? En général, c'est plutôt l'inverse. »
languages.original_text: "That's strange. I can't see or hear anything from the other side... But I'll go ahead and say it since nobody else wants to — I don't like this one bit. So if the darkness leaves the forest, something bad will happen? I thought it was usually the other way around."

traits.locale_text: « C'est bizarre. Tout est calme de l'autre côté de la porte... mais j'ai un mauvais pressentiment, et je pense que j'exprime l'avis général en disant ça. Il se passera quelque chose de terrible si les ténèbres quittent la forêt ? En général, c'est plutôt l'inverse. »

languages.text: 「それは奇妙だわ。私には、向こう側からは何も見えないし、何も聞こえない…でも、誰も言いたがらないから、みんなに代わって言いましょうか…あまり言いたくないけどね。もし闇が森から去ったら、何か悪いことが起こるの？普通は、その逆だと思うのだけれど」
languages.original_text: "That's strange. I can't see or hear anything from the other side... But I'll go ahead and say it since nobody else wants to — I don't like this one bit. So if the darkness leaves the forest, something bad will happen? I thought it was usually the other way around."

traits.locale_text: 「それは奇妙だわ。私には、向こう側からは何も見えないし、何も聞こえない…でも、誰も言いたがらないから、みんなに代わって言いましょうか…あまり言いたくないけどね。もし闇が森から去ったら、何か悪いことが起こるの？普通は、その逆だと思うのだけれど」

languages.text: "Das ist seltsam. Ich kann nichts von der anderen Seite sehen oder hören ... Aber ich sage es frei heraus, weil es sonst niemand macht ... mir gefällt das alles nicht. Also ... falls die Dunkelheit den Wald verlässt, passiert dann etwas Schlimmes? Ich dachte, normalerweise ist es umgekehrt."
languages.original_text: "That's strange. I can't see or hear anything from the other side... But I'll go ahead and say it since nobody else wants to — I don't like this one bit. So if the darkness leaves the forest, something bad will happen? I thought it was usually the other way around."

traits.locale_text: "Merkwürdig. Ich kann von dort nichts sehen oder hören ... Aber ich spreche für alle anderen, da niemand bereit ist, es zu sagen: Mir gefällt das ganz und gar nicht. Wenn die Dunkelheit den Wald verlässt, geschieht dann etwas Schlimmes? Oft sind die Dinge ja etwas verquer."

languages.text: "Bu çok tuhaf. Diğer taraftan ne bir görüntü geliyor ne de bir ses... Ama yine de konuşacağım çünkü bunu kimse söylemek istemiyor. Bundan hiç hoşlanmadım. Yani karanlık, ormanı azat ederse kötü bir şey mi olacak? Normalde tam tersidir diye düşünmüştüm."
languages.original_text: "That's strange. I can't see or hear anything from the other side... But I'll go ahead and say it since nobody else wants to — I don't like this one bit. So if the darkness leaves the forest, something bad will happen? I thought it was usually the other way around."
